inclusion.criterion: Pre-operative diagnosis or suspicion of papillary thyroid cancer, usually by fine needle aspiration (FNA)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No pre-operative evidence of cervical lymph node metastases on neck ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to read and write in English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent active malignancy of another type
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to give informed consent or lacks decision making capacity
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone XRT, but does not have any exclusion criteria that would make them ineligible.
